seo.title: gonzaddv - My personal website
seo.description: Hey! I'm Gonza, a developer and entrepreneur with a love of writing and a drive to create positive change. Alongside my technical expertise, I'm deeply interested in history, philosophy and self-development. As a creative and expressive individual, I enjoy documenting my experiences and insights through writing, sharing my thoughts on the topics I enjoy the most. I believe that through the power of words, we can inspire others, share knowledge, and make a meaningful impact on the world.
